name: Spider's Tea
description:
Mini Jam 123: Web ( This game has a few physics/collision bugs, but it doesn't make it unplayable or not enjoyable, have fun! ) This is a rage game

A game where you're a little spider girl, you need to get home as fast as you can to drink your favourite tea! You can swing around, wall jump and do what spiders do.

Press F4 to toggle fullscreen mode

Made by Golita (aka Saü) and Lilly.io
